Text.Page:
Cornered, Dakuryon bound with magic. But Rhodos fought through it. Injured, Dakuryon fled, and returned to Highwatch with Verikam.

Dougal ordered Sky Cruiser Intrepid to Velika in order to chase Dakuryon, and Rhodos swore that he will hunt Dakuryon down to the end of the world.

We will save Verikam and slay Dakuryon. I will use his head as a chamberpot for a week!

Are you ready, ? Let's go!

It's much bigger than I anticipated. What are the archdevas doing?

No matter. We can question any survivors after we kill Dakuryon.

His magic sapped much of my strength, but I shall be restored to full vitality soon enough.

You have my thanks. It took great courage to face Dakuryon.

I can't believe he escaped! Bah!

Escort Verikam back to Highwatch. We will seal the support of the baraka with this rescue, which we'll need to deal with the archdevas once and for all.

Your tireless efforts greatly disrupted Dakuryon's plans and you saved Verikam. Allow us to express our gratitude. Highwatch stands with the Valkyon Federation and the Khirians against the archdevas.

Our paths will cross again in the future, but for now your Legate Dougal wishes to speak with you.

Well done, . Losing Zolyn and Paesyn is quite sad, but you saved Verikam and stopped Dakuryon for now.

I've sent word back to Velika for reinforcements; they're sending the sky cruiser Victory with more soldiers.

Yet again, we owe you a great debt.
The Khirians will not rest until Dakuryon pays for his crimes, <PCNAME>. I give you my word that we will see him brought down and the archdevas defeated.
